Description:
Style and Space in Lifestyle Setting
Stretching well back beyond its discrete façade, this stylish family home ensures there's space for formal gatherings, relaxed family occasions and even two outdoor entertaining zones for summertime enjoyment.
Relishing its own street frontage, the home greets you with a welcoming entry foyer that's home to a cloak closet and storage cupboard, perfect for shoes as you step foot inside. Sleek floorboards take you past the large study/living room before opening to reveal a glorious lounge room with sliding door access onto a private deck for outdoor entertaining.
Attracting all day sunlight due to its northerly orientation, the open plan kitchen, meals and family room showcases sparkling stone benches, glass splashbacks, 900mm stainless steel appliances plus a Blanco dishwasher, while the low-maintenance backyard tempts children and guests outside for casual catchups.
Positioned for peace and privacy on the upper level, the three robed bedrooms are accompanied by a sitting zone/study and include the master bedroom with walk-in-robe and luxurious ensuite, further served by a family bathroom with floor-to-ceiling tiles, upstairs and downstairs powder rooms plus a laundry.
Complemented by high ceilings (3m downstairs, 2.7m upstairs), ducted heating, evaporative cooling, under stair storage, water tank, garden shed plus a single garage with internal access and 2nd driveway space.
Situated to provide incredible convenience, near Clayton Train Station, Clayton Rd shops, Monash Medical Centre, Monash Uni, Clayton South Primary, Westall Secondary, Ikea, M-City development plus Monash and EastLink Freeways.
